languages.text: {n}Кибелла зловеще улыбается.{/n} "Ты плохо знаешь Домин? В притоне тщетной телесной радости он{mf||а} отыщет достойного врага с той же легкостью, что и на поле брани".

{n}Kibellah flashes her an ominous smile.{/n} "Who do you think the Domin is? Even in a den of hollow bodily pleasures, {mf|he|she} would find a worthy enemy just as easily as on the field of battle."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла зловеще улыбается.{/n} "Ты плохо знаешь Домин? В притоне тщетной телесной радости он{mf||а} отыщет достойного врага с той же легкостью, что и на поле брани".

{n}Kibellah flashes her an ominous smile.{/n} "Who do you think the Domin is? Even in a den of hollow bodily pleasures, {mf|he|she} would find a worthy enemy just as easily as on the field of battle."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah le lanza una sonrisa siniestra.{/n} «¿Por quién toma a mi Domin? Incluso en un antro de placeres carnales, encontraría a un enemigo digno con la misma facilidad que en una batalla campal».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah flashes her an ominous smile.{/n} "Who do you think the Domin is? Even in a den of hollow bodily pleasures, {mf|he|she} would find a worthy enemy just as easily as on the field of battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah le lanza una sonrisa siniestra.{/n} «¿Por quién toma a mi Domin? Incluso en un antro de placeres carnales, encontraría a un enemigo digno con la misma facilidad que en una batalla campal».

languages.text: {n}キベラは不吉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n} 「ドミンは誰だと思う？中途半端な肉体的快楽の巣窟でも、{mf|彼|彼女}は戦場かのように、さも簡単に敵を見つけるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah flashes her an ominous smile.{/n} "Who do you think the Domin is? Even in a den of hollow bodily pleasures, {mf|he|she} would find a worthy enemy just as easily as on the field of battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは不吉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n} 「ドミンは誰だと思う？中途半端な肉体的快楽の巣窟でも、{mf|彼|彼女}は戦場かのように、さも簡単に敵を見つけるだろう」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈脸上露出了不祥的微笑。{/n}“你以为秘者是什么人？哪怕是在这种充满肉体与享乐的洞窟之中，{mf|他|她}也可以轻而易举地找到有价值的敌人，就像在战场上那样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah flashes her an ominous smile.{/n} "Who do you think the Domin is? Even in a den of hollow bodily pleasures, {mf|he|she} would find a worthy enemy just as easily as on the field of battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈脸上露出了不祥的微笑。{/n}“你以为秘者是什么人？哪怕是在这种充满肉体与享乐的洞窟之中，{mf|他|她}也可以轻而易举地找到有价值的敌人，就像在战场上那样。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lächelt sie bedrohlich an.{/n} "Wer ist wohl {mf|der|die} Domin? Selbst in einer Lasterhöhle leerer körperlicher Freuden würde {mf|er|sie} ebenso leicht einen würdigen Feind finden wie auf dem Schlachtfeld."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah flashes her an ominous smile.{/n} "Who do you think the Domin is? Even in a den of hollow bodily pleasures, {mf|he|she} would find a worthy enemy just as easily as on the field of battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah lächelt sie bedrohlich an.{/n} "Wer ist wohl {mf|der|die} Domin? Selbst in einer Lasterhöhle leerer körperlicher Freuden würde {mf|er|sie} ebenso leicht einen würdigen Feind finden wie auf dem Schlachtfeld."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se fend d'un sourire carnassier.{/n} « Pour qui prenez-vous {mf|le|la} Domin ? Même dans un repaire dédié aux vains plaisirs charnels, {mf|il|elle} trouverait un ennemi digne de ce nom aussi aisément que sur un champ de bataille. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah flashes her an ominous smile.{/n} "Who do you think the Domin is? Even in a den of hollow bodily pleasures, {mf|he|she} would find a worthy enemy just as easily as on the field of battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah se fend d'un sourire carnassier.{/n} « Pour qui prenez-vous {mf|le|la} Domin ? Même dans un repaire dédié aux vains plaisirs charnels, {mf|il|elle} trouverait un ennemi digne de ce nom aussi aisément que sur un champ de bataille. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, ona uğursuz bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Domin'in kim olduğunu sanıyorsun? İçi boş fâni zevkler yuvasında bile âdeta savaş alanındaymışçasına kolaylıkla dişine layık bir düşman bulabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah flashes her an ominous smile.{/n} "Who do you think the Domin is? Even in a den of hollow bodily pleasures, {mf|he|she} would find a worthy enemy just as easily as on the field of battle."
